spec.name: Villa Avenir
spec.description: Villa Avenir is a historically significant residential villa completed in 1929, designed by architect **Louis Henri Fleurant**. The villa's architecture is a notable example of the Art Deco style applied to residential buildings in Casablanca, featuring simplified geometric forms and elegance. Its architectural importance was recognized with its designation as a **National Material Patrimony** site in 2018.
